channel.title: Please help i have server probems!
channel.description:
:confused: :confused: :confused:
i extraced the file
i opened the rar. with WinRar
i clicked on the runserver.bat
IT OPENS FOR A HALF A SECOND THEN IT DISSAPERS!!!!!!!!!! WHY?????????? :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

item.title: Please help i have server probems!
item.dc:creator: @legolos598 legolos598
item.description:
@legolos598 wrote:

oh sorry i ment compile i edited compile… :D[br][size=1]Posted at: October 28, 2006, 09:19:49 PM[/size][hr]and oh ya i dont have a folder called “jdk1.5.0_07” and i dont have a file called “javac”

where can i get “javac”?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 28, 2006, 09:25:23 PM[/size][hr]hello?

item.source: Please help i have server probems!

item.title: Please help i have server probems!
item.dc:creator: @afferin afferin
item.description:
@afferin wrote:

go to compile then right click and you should see edit now open that, and replace everything in there with one of these @echo off COLOR 08 title shotscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause

@echo off COLOR 08 title shotscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server pause

@echo off COLOR 08 title shotscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe" server pause

@echo off COLOR 08 title shotscape Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

one of those should work

Read full topic
